cast.name: 迈尔斯·戴维斯 Miles Davis

this_title: Celebrating a Masterpiece: Kind of Blue
introduction: Celebrating a Masterpiece: Kind of Blue (…) incorporates material from the 2004 mini-documentary, Made In Heaven, including black-and-white still photography of the recording sessions and the voices of Miles (at the sessions), as well as excerpts of radio interviews with the late Bill Evans.
chinese_title: Celebrating a Masterpiece: Kind of Blue
